attributes.action: pave the way for reparations to be made for the irreparable damage caused by multiculturalism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What happened to the human rights of the indigenous people to have a say and choice in the way they live?  This petition is one side of a two-fold view and is only worthy of rejection on the grounds of being offensive, intemperate, or provocative in a political system that is undemocratic.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
